DOC.brief_summary: Tramadol labor analgesia : low risk placebo control randomise control trial
DOC.brief_title: Tramadol Labor Analgesia : Placebo Controlled Randomised Control Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators administer 100mg tramadol 2ml distilled water intramuscular route blind manner . Visual analogue score assess begin every hour till four hour . patient satisfaction , safety outcome , duration 1st 2nd stage labor , proportion woman experience nausea , vomit increased sleepiness , postpartum haemorrhage , apgar score 5 minute , need nicu admission wiil assess end
DOC.criteria: deliver first time ( nulliparous ) well establish labor ( 3 contraction span ten minute cervical dilation 4 cm > = 80 % effacement cervix medical disorder diabetes , hypertension obstetric high risk factor
